Articles.Content:
Realism for extra points! Scoring here! PICS as always!

USE MODS, ITS FUN!

Why nuclear ICBMs because some of the first space rockets were based off of Nice little ICBMs with nuclear Payloads!

Realism +0-5 points

Functionality(Does it blow city size areas up): +0-1337

Ease of Use: +0-10

Speed(American Minuteman Missiles can go anywhere in the world in 30 minutes or less!): +0-20

Bonus! If you can make other US military vehicles! Radar trucks!(CART MOD MAYBE?): 5 Points for each Extra!

Total Possible: 1372-infinity!
There are mods that include nuclear warheads?

There are mods that include nuclear warheads?

No I wish! But you can set the explosion for a fuel tank to super high so when it impacts its near Nuclear KSP would be a lot more deadly and pretty with mushroom clouds.

Lol.

Guess what I thought of first when I made the first rocket jump with my one man capsule.... The conical shape made me think of exactly that instantly.

Then I was like: "Hey wait, thatÃ‚Â´s not the point of the game......."

Lol.

Guess what I thought of first when I made the first rocket jump with my one man capsule.... The conical shape made me think of exactly that instantly.

Then I was like: "Hey wait, thatÃ‚Â´s not the point of the game......."

Killing Kerbals is the point of the game! There is no Objective, A LOT of people make Planes to Fly into KSC or download Jar's Weapon Mod and blow up KSC, a Nuke would make it so much faster though.

cough cough you can use http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/4231-Feanor-Rocketry-NEW-0-5-Stock-pack-released%21?highlight=icbm+.5+stock tada

and you could use the new romfarer laser missiles for MIRVs.
I Will Be back with Nukness! My comupter is going to bloom up!
What if the nuke... is a spaceplane?
How about one with a mobile launch platform?

I tend to do enough damage just leaving the launch pad without 1600 tons of rocket fuel going up in smoke.

Trying to do this on purpose sounds like it'll be all too easy.

I could just put several 3m fuel tanks atop a 3m NERVA engine.

Fuel-air plus nuclear fission, provided the engines can be rigged to go prompt-critical.

That's be one heck of a MIRV.

The rest of the pictures.

Youve earned bonus Points, Ill Edit your Score in the main post in a few minutes! Make sure to Upload Craft Files so everyone can have fun!

Let me see... ah HA, I'm going to blow up KSC 2, I'll edit with pictures when I've done it!

Edit: I never got around to doing that, and I'm scrapping the project

Edited September 1, 2013 by joshkb01
just an update

Youve earned bonus Points, Ill Edit your Score in the main post in a few minutes! Make sure to Upload Craft Files so everyone can have fun!

Here you go, requires stock parts, Radial Thrusters, DSM pack, HTSW Carts, Feanor ICBM, and the Damned Robotics pack.

Edited September 26, 2012 by macintux

Some more pictures showing range.

Just barely reaches beyond the peninsula across the ocean from KSP, had to use RCS to lower the range some so I hit land.

Final range ended up being 465 km.

Some more pictures showing range.

Just barely reaches beyond the peninsula across the ocean from KSP, had to use RCS to lower the range some so I hit land.

Final range ended up being 465 km.

Great job!

Here's mine. It's not particularly easy to use, although it has fuel to reach pretty much anywhere. It was technically the ascent stage of my Personnel Transfer Vehicle, but that's the price you pay to get eight more Kerbals into space.
